frontmatter.title: Inspiring faces want to know
frontmatter.excerpt: Finding inspiration from the faces of strangers on Sktchy for iOS.

markdownRemark.html:
It’s been a lot of fun drawing the faces of strangers. But you know what’s even better’? Having strangers draw you in return.

If you have an iOS device I encourage you to download the free Sktchy app. You don’t have to be an artist to use it — in fact most using the app aren’t. You just need to upload a selfie or two and hopefully inspire someone to create a work of art based on it.

I’ve been known to peruse the Inspiration tab in look of faces to draw. So if you’ve been patiently waiting for me to draw you as part of my PaperFaces Project, Sktchy might be a nice alternative.

Beard selfies are a must

Goofy homeless looking beards help get you noticed. Apparently Sktchy artists enjoy them because mine has managed to inspire a handful of drawings and sketches. Who knew?
